title: Manager
text: Manage the After-school program consisting of 10 teachers and 60 students. Also, taught a Saturday Math program for elementary and junior high school students

title: Owner
text: Led and managed the After-school and Saturday program for statewide standardized test preparation. Designed curriculum for the New York Statewide Exam (grades 3 - 5). Reduced costs of the summer program by 35% by investing in the hiring of subject-versatile teaching staffs.

title: Manager
text: Led and managed an after-school program with approximately 50 students. Trained over 60 after-school, summer camp teachers and teacher's assistants. Responsible for an annual budget of $120,000 distributed for hiring needs, operational costs and employee travel expenses.
